## Create a function to realize centralization, i.e, make the mean near to 0
```{r}
transform_data <- function(data){
  return(data - mean(data))
}
```

## use mtcars dataset to test function
```{r}
centered_data <- transform_data(mtcars$mpg)
mean(centered_data)
```
